sentences.sContent: New threats of violence have effectively torpedoed the peace talks.
sentences.sCn: 新的暴力威胁实际上已经破坏了和平谈判。

synos.tran: 鱼雷；[军]水雷；油井爆破筒；电鳐；职业杀手

trans.tranCn: 鱼雷；水雷；油井爆破筒；电鳐；职业杀手
trans.tranOther: a long narrow weapon that is fired under the surface of the sea and explodes when it hits something
to attack or destroy a ship with a torpedo
